Text:
Before downloading this realize that in the description it says "Sound Censor by CBS TV". These "censors" cut 5-10 seconds out of the audio each time there is a curse word. Realize how many curse words are in "Forever" and "Drop the World".
I honestly would say do not download, I appreciate the rip done by asault18, but the sound censor destroys the songs. CBS could have just cut the single word out instead of a whole 5-10 seconds of the song.
Ok im gonna upload a new torrent of this without the sound censor and better resolution!!
